General.Name: Zhejiang Yueling Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Yueling Co., Ltd. engages in research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of aluminum alloy wheels in China and internationally. The company offers car, truck alloy, classic, flow forming, low pressure, motorcycle, truck, and ATV/kart wheels under the Yueling, YLW, FFP, ARTKA, FORZUTO, and DAUNTLESS brands. It also exports its products. It also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Yueling Wheel Hub Making Co., Ltd. Zhejiang Yueling Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Wenling, China.

1.Name: Mr. Qing Hong  Chen
1.Title: Fin. Director & Head of Accounting Department
